meanings.definition: A condition characterized by a decrease in the number of white blood cells in the blood.
meanings.sent1: Leukopenias can make it harder for the body to fight infections.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with leukopenias after running blood tests.
meanings.sent3: When the leukopenias party in the blood gets too wild, the immune system struggles.

meanings.definition: The presence of an abnormally low level of white blood cells in the body.
meanings.sent1: Severe leukopenias can lead to increased susceptibility to illnesses.
meanings.sent2: The hospital monitored the patient closely due to leukopenias.
meanings.sent3: The leukopenias in the body decided to take a vacation, leaving the immune system unguarded.
